content: hook from front to back and to front again around post of indicated stitch yarn over pull up a loop yarn over pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook yarn over pull yarn through 3 loops for a completed decrease f and ftr decrease front post double_crochet and front post treble_crochet two together decrease holding back the last loop of both stitches f around post of first st indicated ftr around post of second st indicated yarn over pull through all three loops on hook popcorn f work 3 f around post of next stitch drop loop from hook insert hook from front to back into first f of 3 f group pull dropped loop through st popcorn f video popcorn complete 3 double_crochet in the stitch indicated drop loop from hook insert hook from front to back into first double_crochet of 3 double_crochet group pull dropped loop through st rightcross skip next stitch f around each post of next 2 stitches working behind the 2 f just made btr around post of skipped stitch leftcross skip next 2 stitches btr around post of next stitch working in front of the btr just made f around each post of the 2 skipped stitches join join with a slip_stitch in the usual way join b drop loop from hook insert hook from back to front into second stitch of this round pull dropped loop through it © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 5 note ● ch2 is part of fpdc or bpdc and does not count as a separate st ● the bag is worked with right side facing at all times ● join most rounds with a slip_stitch in the top of second stitch of this round unless otherwise noted ● сrochet b around top around any popcorn 2tog or 3tog stitches unless otherwise noted b around top video ● if you have already crocheted around post of the st skip this st unless otherwise noted ● join b and first b in the round video ● join b and first b in the round step1 join b step2 join b step3 join b b ch2 yarn over the hook from back to front the hook from front to back between the posts of the last again between the posts of the and first first and second yarn over and draw the yarn yarn over and draw the yarn around the post of the stitch through the 2 loops on the yarn over hook twice © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 6 chain chain half_double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet front post double_crochet f front post treble_crochet ftr back post treble_crochet btr back post double_crochet b front post double front post double crochet 2 together crochet 3 together f2tog f3tog front post double front post treble_crochet crochet and front post and front post double treble_crochet together crochet together f and ftr decrease ftr and f decrease front post increases f3i front post increases f2i rightcross leftcross back
